Frequently asked questions

Don‚Äôt find your answer here? just send me a message for any query.

What kinds of projects are you open to?

Code Reviews and Debugging, Learning and Tutorials, Project Planning, Implementation Assistance, Performance Optimization, Tooling and Setup, UX/UI Design, Exploring New Technologies

How much do you charge per hour?

$20 - $40 per hour

During which time zone are you operating?

I operate 24/7 and can assist you at any time, regardless of your time zone, including Bangladesh Standard Time (BST, UTC+6). Feel free to reach out whenever you need help!

What's the typical project duration?

Project duration: Small (1-2 weeks), Medium (1-3 months), Large (3-6 months or more).
